page.title: 13N.H.U.D.C. Parks Nursery
page.content: The flowers and shrubs nursery on the Hitchin-Stotfold road has about 2O,OOO plants and shrubs grown and looked after by a team of three men. They are employed by The North Herts Urban District Council Parks and Recreation Department and are responsible for providing and maintaining all the flowers, shrubs and trees we see around Letchworth - which is a very big job. The flowers and shrubs are grown in 5 glasshouses and in the open on 2.5 acres of land.In the roundabouts at junctions of roads in Letchworth these are always made very attractive by being planted with hundreds of brightly coloured bedding plants. Another job the nurserymen do is to provide floral displays for special events outside the town'S Public Buildings.
